sentences.en: 'Did you ever see a counterfeit of timidity, Mr. Lorry?'
sentences.cn: “ 你看见过假装胆小怕事的么, 罗瑞先生? ”

sentences.en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

sentences.en: And then , abruptly, he beamed at Henry with a fatherly genial air, incredibly counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 紧接着, 他却突然无比虚伪地摆出了一副亲如慈父的神气, 满面堆笑地问候亨利.

sentences.en: Are you aware these notes are counterfeit?
sentences.cn: 你觉察到这些钞票是伪造的吗？

sentences.en: Counterfeit or poor - quality commodities are not worth a penny.
sentences.cn: 假冒伪劣商品都不名一文.

sentences.en: Counterfeit portraits often look dull or one - dimensional.
sentences.cn: 假冒的画像看上去常常显得呆滞或缺乏立体感.

sentences.en: Example of CDS anti - counterfeit measures operating on image editing software.
sentences.cn: 例如光盘 防伪 措施作业图像编辑软件.

sentences.en: He admitted possessing and delivering counterfeit currency.
sentences.cn: 他承认持有和运送了假币。

sentences.en: I scorn the counterfeIt'sentiment you offer.
It is a crime to counterfeit money.
It is against the law to counterfeit money.
It is used for hot stamping of counterfeit proof labels.
sentences.cn: 用于防伪商标产品的烫印使用.

sentences.en: Levi Strauss says counterfeits of the company's jeans are flooding Europe.
sentences.cn: 利瓦伊·斯特劳斯说该公司牛仔裤的仿冒品充斥着欧洲市场。

sentences.en: So she turned to examine the banknotes, as she could tell genuine ones from counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 大娘回头就来检查那四张票子的花纹, 因为她已经认得了票子的真假了.

sentences.en: The early counterfeit cards were crude and easily recognizable.
sentences.cn: 早期的伪卡都是粗制滥造的货色,很容易识别.

sentences.en: This ten - dollar note is a counterfeit.

trans.tran_en: made to look exactly like something else, in order to deceive people
to copy something exactly in order to deceive people
